\index{consensus\_mechanism() (in module blockchain)@\spxentry{consensus\_mechanism()}\spxextra{in module blockchain}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:blockchain.consensus_mechanism}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{blockchain.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{consensus\_mechanism}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{\_chain}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{\_connected\_nodes}}}{}
Consensus mechanism to make sure that the nodes in
the network always have the longest (valid) chain

A basic algorithm which sends /get\_chain requests
to all other connected nodes in the network.
If a longer chain is found, current node’s chain is
replaced in order to keep the blockchain up\sphinxhyphen{}to\sphinxhyphen{}date

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{construct\_chain\_again() (in module blockchain)@\spxentry{construct\_chain\_again()}\spxextra{in module blockchain}}

from the json data

\end{fulllineitems}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:module-node_state}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!node\_state@\spxentry{node\_state}}\index{node\_state@\spxentry{node\_state}!module@\spxentry{module}}

\section{node\_state.py}
\label{\detokenize{index:node-state-py}}
Module that keeps track of
state such as wallet amounts of Nodes for making validation of
transactions easy
\index{BUY\_TRANSACTION\_MINER\_REWARD (in module node\_state)@\spxentry{BUY\_TRANSACTION\_MINER\_REWARD}\spxextra{in module node\_state}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:node_state.BUY_TRANSACTION_MINER_REWARD}}\pysigline{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{node\_state.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{BUY\_TRANSACTION\_MINER\_REWARD}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{ = Decimal(\textquotesingle{}0.05\textquotesingle{})}}}
Percentage, (in the form of a fraction) of the successful sale of
ownership credited to the miner of the Buy transaction

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{MEME\_FORMAT\_MINER\_REWARD (in module node\_state)@\spxentry{MEME\_FORMAT\_MINER\_REWARD}\spxextra{in module node\_state}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:node_state.MEME_FORMAT_MINER_REWARD}}\pysigline{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{node\_state.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{MEME\_FORMAT\_MINER\_REWARD}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{ = Decimal(\textquotesingle{}0.10\textquotesingle{})}}}
Percentage, (in the form of a fraction) of upvote credits rewarded
to the miner who mined to MemeFormat.

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{MEME\_FORMAT\_OWNER\_PORTION (in module node\_state)@\spxentry{MEME\_FORMAT\_OWNER\_PORTION}\spxextra{in module node\_state}}

\begin{fulllineitems}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:module-atomic}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!atomic@\spxentry{atomic}}\index{atomic@\spxentry{atomic}!module@\spxentry{module}}

\label{\detokenize{index:atomic-py}}
